item.description:
It's time to bike somewhere new! How about Jamestown?

We'll be meeting at 1:15 at the Beavertail lighthouse (located as the southern tip of the island). It's the really tall building in the picture on the event's meetup page.

I'm not *exactly* sure about where we'll be pedaling, but we will probably take this route. It will be roughly 20 miles of street riding.

We're going to be riding on roads NOT on dedicated bike paths. Because of this I'm going to cap the size of this meetup and disallow maybes. PLEASE ONLY SIGN UP AS A YES IF YOU ARE PRETTY SURE YOU CAN ATTEND. I understand last minute things come up, but we want to let as many people on this trip as we can. A waiting list will be available.

I *highly suggest* that you bring a helmet, sunglasses and water with you on this ride.

We'll be traveling around 11 miles per hour. For a frame of reference, we cycled at 8.5 miles an hour on last week's Blackstone River Ride
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us at the big lighthouse (at the very southern tip of the island) or try my cell (401) 699-7304
item.name: Biking in Jamestown!! Medium speed, around 11 mph (Optional Picnic After)
